ygData.subject: The Real Scoop on Genni
ygData.msgSnippet: ... Actually, as I understand it, the reason that Genni disappeared was that she was shut down due to an exploit.  You could buy fire opals from her for 55
ygData.messageBody:
Ryan Honeyman wrote:

> From: Ryan Honeyman <slasher@...>
>
> >Genni is currently broken at least on Cazic Thule,
> >prolly on all servers.
>
> She's not broken on Innoruuk, and I would doubt she is broken
> on any 'intelligent' server where stoopid noob f'ing idiots
> don't attack her.

Actually, as I understand it, the reason that Genni disappeared was that she was shut down due to
an exploit. You could buy fire opals from her for 55 plat, then turn around and sell them to a
vendor for a profit! So GMs shut them down.

Jyzan
